name: Festival of the Spirit
description:
It's the yearly Festival of the Spirit and this time, the grand prize is yours, you just know it! 

An ancillary prologue and early gameplay demo for the upcoming Tenderfoot Tactics. 


badru - code / art / writing / design

michael bell - sound / music

isa hutchinson - design / writing

taylor thomas - ux design

zoe vartanian - ui design

madison pathe - video editing
